title: tamizh maNam
sahitya:
tamizh maNam kamazha vENDum shen tamizh nADengaNum Aghilum dEivIkat-


anupallavi

  amizhdin mazhalaik-kuzhavip-paruvam mudalE annaiyin pAl maNamuDan tAi mozhiyAm


caraNam    pAriledukaiyuDan mOnaiyazhagu pira bhASaiyil Eduyar mEDai prasangamO-DapAra
 guNangaL magizhndADarangugaLilum AdalgaLilim ishaip-pADalgaLilum shen
